article_title: Covid anxiety remains as Pfizer and US government provide different messaging
meta_description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention issued new guidance Friday with an unmistakable message: kids should be back in school in person this fall and schools should be very cautious about removing the measures meant to protect them. But decisions about Covid-19 safety precautions in schools will be made at the local level and they are already a hot political topic.
